metadata.name: Pure man #1
metadata.description:
Kim Won Geun has conveyed the inner side of B-class life with the keyword 'laughter'. The humor of ‘pure macho’, which has changed from a character that expresses a lonely and painful inner person to a smile that evokes laughter, works like a healing agent to endure a difficult life. With short hair, a gold necklace, and the appearance of a big gangster, he gives a glimpse of true love, along with a savage and comical reality, in the rain with a bouquet of flowers.

#NFTart   #physical-based   #sculpture
